metadata.name: Browsing
metadata.description: Get information from websites, and interact with them.

external-endpoints.name: Access to the internet
external-endpoints.description: Accesses the internet to retrieve information.

post.description:
Gets the text content, form elements, links and other elements of a website.
If content-type is not "text/html" then just URL content is returned.

name.title: Name
name.description: The user agent to use for browsing

user_agent.title: User Agent
user_agent.description: the user agent to use for browsing

text_content.title: Text Content
text_content.description: The text content of the website

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of the form element

text.title: Text
text.description: The text of the form element

placeholder.title: Placeholder
placeholder.description: The placeholder of the form element

aria_label.title: Aria Label
aria_label.description: The aria label of the form element

id.title: Id
id.description: The id of the form element

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the form element

class_.title: Class
class_.description: The class of the form element

value_type.title: Value Type
value_type.description: The type of the form element value

value_to_fill.title: Value To Fill
value_to_fill.description: The value to fill in the form element

count.title: Count
count.description: The count of the form element

result.description: The result for the action if it ran successfully

error.title: Error
error.description: The error message if the action failed for some reason

schema.title: Response for Get Website Content
schema.description: Text content, form elements and elements of the website.

post.description: Download a file from the given URL.

file_url.title: File Url
file_url.description: the URL of the file to download

max_filesize_in_megabytes.title: Max Filesize In Megabytes
max_filesize_in_megabytes.description: maximum file size in MB to download

content.title: Content
content.description: The content of the downloaded file

filepath.title: Filepath
filepath.description: The path of the downloaded file

content_type.title: Content Type
content_type.description: The content type of the file

content_length.title: Content Length
content_length.description: The size of the content in bytes

result.description: The result for the action if it ran successfully

error.title: Error
error.description: The error message if the action failed for some reason

schema.title: Response for Download File
schema.description:
Content of the file (if text), the filepath where file is download and
status of the download.
